content: single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 12 shells round 15 slip_stitch to center chain-1 space of first shell chain 1 single_crochet in same space work open shell in next single_crochet *single_crochet in center chain-1 space of next shell open shell in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 12 shells round 16 chain 3 work double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet all in same single_crochet beg open shell completed single_crochet in chain-1 space of next shell *open shell in next single_crochet single_crochet in chain-1 space of next shell repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 12 shells rnds 17-20 repeat rnds 15-16 round 21 repeat round 15 2 round 22 chain 3 work 4 double_crochet all in same single_crochet beg closed shell completed single_crochet in chain-1 space of next shell *closed shell in next single_crochet single_crochet in chain-1 space of next shell repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 12 shells fasten_off and weave in tails finishing corkscrew topper chain 60 thread beg end of chain through top center of hat then proceed to form corkscrew work 3 single_crochet in ea chain across skipping over sts where chain is threaded through top of hat fasten_off twist chain to form corkscrew trim copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
